pages.text: $(weapon)Knockback$() pushes enemies away from you when you strike them!$(br2)Each level increases the distance enemies are knocked back, giving you breathing room in combat.

pages.title: Tactical Uses
pages.text: $(li)Create distance from melee mobs$(li)Knock enemies off cliffs$(li)Push mobs into traps$(li)Control mob positioning$(li)Prevent being surrounded$(br2)$(important)Double-edged sword$() - can make hitting mobs harder!

pages.title: Pro Tips
pages.text: $(li)Great for PvP$(li)Useful in tight spaces$(li)Combine with $(weapon)Fire Aspect$() to keep burning mobs away$(li)Not ideal for boss fights$(li)$(o)Perfect for cliff-side battles!$()
